typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SpeakersSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SpeakersDestination
SpeakersSource exists(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SpeakerExist
